'''1.6.4 Build 6<ref name="blog">{{link |url=https://minecraftedu.tumblr.com/post/65434490656/minecraftedu-1-6-4-stable-version-now-available|title=MinecraftEdu 1.6.4 stable version now available! |date=October 29, 2013 |website=Tumblr|author=}}</ref>'''<ref>{{link |url=https://vimeo.com/109262637|title=Holy Trinity Halstead Y6 MinecraftEDU City - The Park Pt.1 by harrid & akiupt|date=2013|website=Vimeo|author=}}</ref> is the sixth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.6.4, released on October 31, 2013.<ref>{{link |url=https://vimeo.com/109262638|title=Holy Trinity Halstead Y6 MinecraftEDU City - The Park Pt.2 by akiupt & harrid|date=2013|website=Vimeo|author=}}</ref> It is based on [[Java Edition 1.6.4]].

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[MinecraftEdu Launcher|Launcher]]'''
* Stable versions are now bolded in list of updates at Launcher.
* Added a lot of hidden settings to serverwizardsettings.ini that can be used to hide certain components from servertool starting screen:
** <code>disable-servertool-top-menu=true</code>
** <code>disable-servertool-top-menu-file=true</code>
** <code>disable-servertool-top-menu-open=true</code>
** <code>disable-servertool-top-menu-settings=true</code>
** <code>disable-servertool-top-menu-language=true</code>
** <code>disable-servertool-button-tutorial=true</code>
** <code>disable-servertool-button-new=true</code>
** <code>disable-servertool-button-saved=true</code>
** <code>disable-servertool-button-online=true</code>
** <code>disable-servertool-button-local=true</code>
** <code>disable-servertool-button-last=true</code>

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Setting server RAM amount works through the servertool settings.
* Server free RAM amount showing wrong in the server interface.
